mapper.insert: insert into yf_kcmx (sbxh, jgid, yfsb, ckbh, ypxh, ypcd, ypph, ypxq, ypsl, jybz, lsjg, pfjg, jhjg, lsje, pfje, jhje, ykjh, yklj, ykjj, ykpj, ywsj, ywlx, ykkcsb, kcly, jyyy, state) values (#{sbxh,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{jgid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{yfsb,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{ckbh,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{ypxh,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{ypcd,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{ypph,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ypxq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ypsl,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{jybz,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{lsjg,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pfjg,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{jhjg,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{lsje,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pfje,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{jhje,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{ykjh,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{yklj,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{ykjj,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{ykpj,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{ywsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ywlx,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{ykkcsb,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{kcly,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{jyyy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{state,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.update: update yf_kcmx set yfsb = #{yfsb,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ckbh = #{ckbh,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ypxh = #{ypxh,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ypcd = #{ypcd,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ypph = #{ypph,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ypxq = #{ypxq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ypsl = #{ypsl,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, jybz = #{jybz,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, lsjg = #{lsjg,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, pfjg = #{pfjg,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, jhjg = #{jhjg,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, lsje = #{lsje,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, pfje = #{pfje,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, jhje = #{jhje,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ykjh = #{ykjh,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, yklj = #{yklj,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ykjj = #{ykjj,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ykpj = #{ykpj,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ywsj = #{ywsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ywlx = #{ywlx,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ykkcsb = #{ykkcsb,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, kcly = #{kcly,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, jyyy = #{jyyy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, state = #{state,jdbcType=NUMERIC} where sbxh = #{sbxh,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and jgid = #{jgid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
